fields.summary: With Pig multi-query, 2 HCatStorers writing to the same table will trample each other's outputs

fields.summary: Remove unnecessary calls to FileSystem.setOwner() from FileOutputCommitterContainer

ATTACHMENT ID: 12892701 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

I've uploaded the {{branch-2}} patch that's likely to break {{itests/TestExtendedAcls}}. We might have to sort out the call to {{FileSystem.setOwner()}} to modify the group, in {{FileOutputCommitterContainer::applyGroupAndPerms()}}.
